Title: Relates to establishing distinctive "Women Veterans" license plates and the women veterans support fund
Summary: Relates to establishing distinctive "Women Veterans" plates and the women veterans support fund; establishes that moneys of the fund will be used for women veteran homelessness, counseling and other programs that support women veterans.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; add ยง95-j, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing distinctive "Women Veterans" license plates; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "women veterans support fund"
